channel.title: The Radio Dan Show
channel.description: Host Dan Delgado and his co-host/intern Jessica go over the movie and television news of the day. There are featured segments such as the box office report, which Dan and Jessica go over with commentary, and the DVD releases which Jessica picks one that you should be getting. This net radio talk show airs live on TalkRadioX.com five nights a week, Sun-Thur at 8pm EST and can be heard overnights on Detour Talk in the Tri-Cities, TN area.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Death. Taxes. Dan.
channel.itunes:author: Radio Dan
channel.itunes:summary: Host Dan Delgado and his co-host/intern Jessica go over the movie and television news of the day. item.title: The Radio Dan Show - Guest Peter Hyams
item.description: Dan and Jessica welcome director Peter Hyams.

item.title: Show Announcement!
item.description:
I stopped using podomatic a while back. So if anyone out there is looking for this show, please head over to http://talkradiox.com and hit the TRX On Demand link for new shows.
Also if you want the feed it is now: http://talkradiox.com/station/archives/rds
Thanks!

item.title: The Radio Dan Show: Guest The Amazing Kreskin
item.description: The Amazing Keskin visits with Dan and Jessica.
item.dc:creator: Radio Dan
item.itunes:summary: The Amazing Keskin visits with Dan and Jessica.

item.title: The Radio Dan Show: Guest Danny Yount
item.description: Dan and Jess manage to get their act together just in time to talk to movie title designer Danny Yount.
item.dc:creator: Radio Dan
item.itunes:summary: Dan and Jess manage to get their act together just in time to talk to movie title designer Danny Yount.

item.title: The Radio Dan Show: Guest Rian Johnson
item.description: Dan and Jess welcome director Rian Johnson (Brick, The Brothers Bloom) to the show for a lengthy chat.
item.dc:creator: Radio Dan
item.itunes:summary: Dan and Jess welcome director Rian Johnson (Brick, The Brothers Bloom) to the show for a lengthy chat.

item.title: The Radio Dan Show: Guest Ken Levine
item.description: Dan and Jessica somehow manage to get veteran sitcom writer and baseball play by play man Ken Levine to come on and share his Hollywood experiences.
item.dc:creator: Radio Dan
item.itunes:summary: Dan and Jessica somehow manage to get veteran sitcom writer and baseball play by play man Ken Levine to come on and share his Hollywood experiences.

item.title: The Radio Dan Show: Guest Jenn Wenger
item.description: Dan and Jess welcome actress Jenn Wenger (Confessions of a Super Hero). Plus Frank Darabont's Indy 4 script is leaked online.
item.dc:creator: Radio Dan
item.itunes:summary: Dan and Jess welcome actress Jenn Wenger (Confessions of a Super Hero). Plus Frank Darabont's Indy 4 script is leaked online.

item.title: The Radio Dan Show: Guest Jeff Kinney
item.description: Dan and Jessica welcome Diary of a Wimpy Kid author Jeff Kinney to the show. Zoo Wee Mama! Other discussions include: Razzie nominations, Jessica's new diet, and what's a 'showmance'?
item.dc:creator: Radio Dan
item.itunes:summary: Dan and Jessica welcome Diary of a Wimpy Kid author Jeff Kinney to the show. Zoo Wee Mama! Other discussions include: Razzie nominations, Jessica's new diet, and what's a 'showmance'?

item.title: The Radio Dan Show: Guest Robert Osborne
item.description: Turner Classic Movies host and film historian Robert Osborne joins Radio Dan and Jess on the show. The guy knows everything!
item.dc:creator: Radio Dan
item.itunes:summary: Turner Classic Movies host and film historian Robert Osborne joins Radio Dan and Jess on the show. The guy knows everything!

item.title: The Radio Dan Show: Guest JM J. Bullock
item.description: Destiny is fulfilled as Jessica does her Ted Knight impression for guest JM J Bullock. Discussions about Too Close For Comfort abound.
item.dc:creator: Radio Dan
item.itunes:summary: Destiny is fulfilled as Jessica does her Ted Knight impression for guest JM J Bullock. Discussions about Too Close For Comfort abound.

item.title: The Radio Dan Show: Guest Richard Shepard
item.description: Radio Dan and Jess have a disagreement over Zodiac and welcome writer-director Richard Shepard (The Matador) to the show. Wackyness ensues.
item.dc:creator: Radio Dan
item.itunes:summary: Radio Dan and Jess have a disagreement over Zodiac and welcome writer-director Richard Shepard (The Matador) to the show. Wackyness ensues.

item.title: The Radio Dan Show with special guest Joblo!
item.description: Radio Dan and Jess talk movies and Oscars with the main man from Joblo.com, none other than Joblo himself!
item.dc:creator: Radio Dan
item.itunes:summary: Radio Dan and Jess talk movies and Oscars with the main man from Joblo.com, none other than Joblo himself!

item.title: The Radio Dan Show with Guest Eddie Carroll
item.description: Radio Dan and Jessica welcome Eddie Carrol to the show. Eddie travels the country doing his acclaimed one man Jack Benny Show and has been the voice of Jiminy Cricket since 1973. You can find out more about Eddie by visiting www.EddieCarroll.com.
item.dc:creator: Radio Dan
item.itunes:summary:
Radio Dan and Jessica welcome Eddie Carrol to the show. Eddie travels the country doing his acclaimed one man Jack Benny Show and has been the voice of Jiminy Cricket since 1973.
You can find out more about Eddie by visiting www.EddieCarroll.com.

item.title: The Radio Dan Show: Guest Jay Cronley
item.description:
Radio Dan and Jess welcome author, columnist, and horse racing prognosticator Jay Cronley to the show. Jay has written the books responsible for the movies Quick Change, Funny Farm, and Dan's favorite Let It Ride.
Also check out Jay's columns at www.tulsaworld.com
item.dc:creator: Radio Dan
item.itunes:summary:
Radio Dan and Jess welcome author, columnist, and horse racing prognosticator Jay Cronley to the show. Jay has written the books responsible for the movies Quick Change, Funny Farm, and Dan's favorite Let It Ride.
Also check out Jay's columns at www.tulsaworld.com

item.title: The Radio Dan Show: Cannon Films Night
item.description: Radio Dan and Jess welcome Patrick Runkle, the founder of the Cannon Films Appreciation website (www.cannonfilms.com) and discuss the many classic films that company made. Masters of the Universe, Cyborg, Missing in Action, Lifeforce, Death Wish 2-5, and both Lambada films (you remember those right?) are among the many cinematic crimes Cannon committed during it's run in 80's.
item.dc:creator: Radio Dan
item.itunes:summary: Radio Dan and Jess welcome Patrick Runkle, the founder of the Cannon Films Appreciation website (www.cannonfilms.com) and discuss the many classic films that company made. item.title: The Radio Dan Show: Guest Eddie Deezen
item.description: Radio Dan and Jess welcome actor Eddie Deezen to the show. He talks about being in movies, hilarity ensues.
